statements: SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id > 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_information WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM customer_information ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customer_information WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_information WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customer_information WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM customer_information ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT last_name, first_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE 'New%';
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, account_balance FROM accounts INNER JOIN customers ON accounts.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT first_name, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, address, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM contacts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, a.account_type, a.balance FROM customers c INNER JOIN accounts a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT address, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM accounts ORDER BY opened_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM customers WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, a.balance FROM customers c JOIN accounts a ON c.id = a.customer_id WHERE a.balance > 1000;
SELECT cd.email, a.account_type, ad.city FROM contact_details cd JOIN accounts a ON cd.customer_id = a.customer_id JOIN addresses ad ON cd.customer_id = ad.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(account_id) AS num_accounts FROM accounts GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount, invoice_date FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;

SELECT * FROM customers JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id WHERE customers.first_name = 'John' AND accounts.account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY transactions.amount DESC;
SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, accounts.account_type FROM customers INNER JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id WHERE accounts.balance > 5000;

SELECT customers.first_name, invoices.total_amount, payments.amount_paid, payments.payment_date FROM customers JOIN invoices ON customers.customer_id = invoices.customer_id JOIN payments ON invoices.invoice_id = payments.invoice_id WHERE customers.phone_number LIKE '%1234%' ORDER BY invoices.invoice_id ASC;

SELECT * FROM customers JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id WHERE accounts.balance < 0 UNION SELECT * FROM customers JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id WHERE accounts.account_type = 'Checking';

SELECT customers.first_name, accounts.account_type, transactions.amount, transactions.transaction_date FROM customers JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id WHERE customers.last_name = 'Smith' AND accounts.balance > 1000 ORDER BY transactions.transaction_date DESC;
